description: wagons and workers in a shallow pit; buildings at left and in background at right
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Edition

LLC, in the print: [LABDF]; LLC, in pencil: [LB P284]; LRC, in pencil: [RPG6299]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 1994; sold in September for LTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1994-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print (backwards): [A LEPERE]; LRC, in black: [A Lepère]; LLQ at bottom edge, in pencil: [Demolitions de la Sorbonne 1885]
title: Demolition of the Sorbonne
